name: school-website-main
description: This repository contains the source code for a **School Website** that I developed using a combination of HTML, Bootstrap, Glistbox, AOS (Animate on Scroll), Swiper, Isotope-Layout, ImagesLoaded, and JavaScript. The project also includes a Firebase-powered **Admin Interface** for content management, enabling administrators to add or delete content, images, and more from the main website. Additionally, I integrated **Email.js** for collecting emails directly from the website.
